Package context.arch.intelligibility.query


Interface Summary
QueryListener Listens to when a query is invoked, so that it can react to it.
 

Class Summary
AltQuery Extends Query to support asking questions about an alternative outcome value.
Query Encapsulation for a query that may be put into an Explainer to ask for an explanation.
WhatIfQuery Query to ask What If the in-widget input conditions (as Reason) were different, what the outcome would be.
